item.title: keeping pacman mirrorlist sorted by speed
item.description: Automatically keeping pacman mirrorlist sorted by speed after every update

item.title: ubuntu/systemd network does not start with OpenVPN on boot
item.description: A nasty surprise in the latest openvpn@.service definitions on Ubuntu Xenial (16.04) - OpenVPN can start before networking and so dhcp will complain about an unknown interface tun0 and the whole network stack does not get started.

item.title: This is my workstation
item.description: There are many like it, but this one is mine.
